blocks.content:
## **I'm Not Currently Available**

I'm contracting at The Co-op, working on their Insurance website and they've extended my contract until **May 2021.** As such, I won't be looking for a new role until April at the earliest. Please feel free to get in touch around then.

### The Tweak Digital Podcast

At the start of 2021, I launched a podcast in which I interview some of the people I've worked with in the tech community, here in Manchester. [See more about The Tweak Digital Podcast here]().

hero.headline: Hi, my name is John
hero.textline: I'm a senior front-end developer based in Manchester.
